sprint_goal: Establish core vendor profile, store controls, and foundational product management (categories and add/edit/delete product).
epic_coverage: Vendor Profile & Store Management, Product & Catalog Management
key_deliverables: Vendor Profile CRUD API, Product Category CRUD API, Product CRUD API (Add/Edit/Delete), Mapbox Geocoding Integration, Asynchronous Product Deletion Design
demo_objectives: Showcase creating a vendor profile, adding product categories, and performing full CRUD operations on individual products.
success_criteria: All core CRUD APIs for Vendor, Category, and Product are complete, tested, and documented. Asynchronous deletion pattern is designed and approved.
risk_factors: Risk of synchronous inter-service dependency for product deletion (RISK-001) is being mitigated by the async design task (VND-011-T1). Mapbox API dependency (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize async design for deletion. Implement circuit breaker for Mapbox API.
external_dependencies: Mapbox API. Stable API contracts from Identity and Order Management services.
integration_windows: Integration testing for Profile and Product CRUD throughout the sprint.
burndown_target: Target 77 hours completion by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement real-time store operational controls (Hours, Availability), establish the critical Transactional Outbox pattern, and build the foundation for vendor compliance.
epic_coverage: Vendor Profile & Store Management, Vendor Compliance Management
key_deliverables: Business Hours Management API, Store Availability Toggle API with Transactional Outbox, License Management CRUD API, Automated License Expiry Reminder Job (Lambda/EventBridge).
demo_objectives: Demonstrate setting business hours, taking a store online/offline, and managing vendor licenses. Show logs from the automated reminder job.
success_criteria: Transactional Outbox pattern is successfully implemented and tested. Automated job infrastructure is operational. All new APIs are complete and tested.
risk_factors: Complexity of implementing the Transactional Outbox pattern (RISK-002). New infrastructure setup for scheduled jobs (Lambda/EventBridge).
mitigation_strategies: Allocate senior developer to the Transactional Outbox task. Pair programming for new infrastructure setup to ensure knowledge sharing.
external_dependencies: Audit Service API for logging license changes.
integration_windows: Integration testing for event publishing (Transactional Outbox) and scheduled job throughout the sprint.
burndown_target: Target 64 hours completion by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Deliver bulk catalog management (Import/Export with error reporting) and complete the automated compliance workflow (Suspension).
epic_coverage: Product & Catalog Management, Vendor Compliance Management
key_deliverables: Atomic CSV Import for products, CSV Error Report generation, CSV Export for products, Automated Vendor Suspension for expired licenses, and integration with Order Service to enforce suspension.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate uploading a valid CSV to bulk-add products. Demonstrate uploading an invalid CSV and downloading the error report. Show that an order cannot be placed for a vendor suspended due to an expired license.
success_criteria: Bulk import is atomic and performant. Automated suspension job is functional with a 'dry-run' mode. Order service integration is complete.
risk_factors: High risk of data corruption from bulk CSV import (RISK-004). High operational risk from automated suspension job (RISK-005). High cross-team dependency on Order Management service (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategies: Implement atomic, transactional import logic (VND-013-T1). Implement mandatory 'dry-run' mode for suspension job (VND-029-T2). Use contract testing for Order Service integration.
external_dependencies: Order Management service must be available for integration.
integration_windows: Heavy integration testing with Order Management service in week 2.
burndown_target: Target 75 hours completion by end of week 1.
